Product Q&A
Accessories
MAPLE SAFETY EDGE BENCH TOP
Safety edge bench top is made of solid maple strips glued together and electronically cured. The top is kiln dried, sanded smooth and finished with a penetrating oil protectant. Rounded front safety edge protects workers from leaning against sharp edges. Tops must be oiled on all surfaces every 1-2 weeks depending on use or conditions for up keep.

Product Specifications

  • WIDTH INCHES60
  • DEPTH INCHES24
  • COLOR FINISHUnfinished
  • ASSEMBLYUnassembled
  • BRANDJohn Boos
  • MANUFACTURERS PART NUMBERIST003-O
  • TYPESquare Edge
  • MATERIALMaple
  • THICKNESS INCHES1-3/4
  • FOOD SAFEYes
  • COUNTRY OF ORIGINUSA
